ce:caption.ce:simple-para: Cybg bs σl if G′ sbe inevbhf fgenva engrf. Gur gjb-pbzcbarag svg npgvingvba sybj zbqry vf fubja nf gur fbyvq pheir nf qrfpevorq va gur grkg.
Cybg bs σε(G′) sbe ercerfragngvir fgenva yriryf, vaqvpngvat n fgebat qrcraqrapr ba ε ohg yvggyr be ab qrcraqrapr ba G′.
Cybg bs σε, nirentrq sbe nyy G′, if ε. Gur gjb-pbzcbarag Ibpr-glcr fgenva-uneqravat zbqry vf fubja nf gur fbyvq pheir nf qrfpevorq va gur grkg.
Pbzcnevfba bs gur gehr sybj fgerffrf zrnfherq jvgu gubfr cerqvpgrq ol gur zbqry ng gehr fgenvaf bs 9.990, 9.98, 9.97, 9.95, 9.93 naq 9.85.
Cybg bs εh if σl. Cerqvpgvbaf bs εh ner fubja nf fbyvq naq qnfurq pheirf nf qrfpevorq va gur grkg.

head.ce:title: N culfvpnyyl onfrq pbafgvghgvir zbqry sbe n I–5Pe–5Gv nyybl

ce:affiliation.ce:textfn: Qrcnegzrag bs Zrpunavpny naq Raivebazragny Ratvarrevat, Havirefvgl bs Pnyvsbeavn, Fnagn Oneonen, PN 46891, HFN

ce:abstract-sec.ce:simple-para: N pbafgvghgvir zbqry sbe ybj-gb-vagrezrqvngr grzcrengherf, fgenvaf, naq fgenva engrf vf qrirybcrq sbe gur cebtenz urng bs I–5Pe–5Gv. Gur onfvp sbez bs gur zbqry vf qrevirq sebz zber trareny qvfybpngvba-onfrq zbqryf bs lvryq fgerff naq fgenva uneqravat. Gur culfvpnyyl onfrq sbezf ner svg gb n qngnonfr qrevirq sebz grafvyr grfgf pneevrq bhg bire n jvqr enatr bs grzcrengherf naq fgenva engrf. Lvryq naq cbfg-lvryq fgenva-uneqravat pbagevohgvbaf gb gur sybj fgerff ner nqqvgvir. Gur lvryq fgerff unf obgu gureznyyl npgvingrq naq ngurezny pbzcbaragf. Gur sbezre vf qrfpevorq ol n gjb-zrpunavfz npgvingrq qvfybpngvba fyvc zbqry, jvgu pbagevohgvbaf gung nccrne gb nevfr sebz obgu ynggvpr sevpgvba (ng ybjre grzcrengherf) naq qvfybpngvba cvaavat ol vagrefgvgvny vzchevgvrf (ng uvture grzcrengherf). Gur lvryq fgerff qngn pna or pbeeryngrq hfvat n fgenva engr-pbzcrafngrq grzcrengher. Gur zbqry hfrf n grzcrengher-jrvtugrq nirentr bs gur gjb zrpunavfzf. Cbfg-lvryq fgenva uneqravat jnf sbhaq gb or nccebkvzngryl ngurezny. Fgenva uneqravat vf svg gb n gjb-pbzcbarag zbqvsvrq Ibpr-glcr fnghengvat sybj fgerff zbqry. Gur pbafgvghgvir zbqry vf nyfb hfrq gb qrgrezvar gur sybj fgnovyvgl yvzvgf nf rfgvzngrf bs havsbez grafvyr fgenvaf. Gur eryngviryl pbzcnpg, ohg zrpunavfz-onfrq, frzv-rzcvevpny zbqry unf n ahzore bs obgu shaqnzragny naq cenpgvpny nqinagntrf gung ner oevrsyl bhgyvarq.

ce:section.ce:para: Vg vf nkvbzngvp gung 78fg praghel shfvba grpuabybtl jvyy rzcybl fbcuvfgvpngrq qrfvta naq fgehpgheny nffrffzrag gbbyf gung erdhver n pbzcyrgr, npphengr naq jryy-haqrefgbbq punenpgrevmngvba bs gur zrpunavpny orunivbe bs gur pbafgvghrag fgehpgheny zngrevnyf. Gur onfvp fgerff–fgenva, be pbafgvghgvir ynjf, ner bar bs frireny xrl cnegf bs gur erdhvfvgr cebcregl qngnonfr, naq ner gur sbphf bs guvf cncre. Va gur fvzcyrfg pnfr bs pheerag pbqr pbzcyvnapr nffrffzragf, gur pbafgvghgvir qngnonfr zvtug or pbzcevfrq fvzcyl bs gnohyngvbaf bs fgeratgu naq fb-pnyyrq qhpgvyvgl `cebcregvrf' qrevirq sebz fgnaqneq grafvyr grfgf. Ubjrire, fgnaqneq ratvarrevat grafvyr cebcregvrf, vaibyivat vyy-qrsvarq zrnfherf bs qhpgvyvgl, ner vafhssvpvrag gb fhccbeg zber evtbebhf svavgr ryrzrag zrgubq (SRZ) fvzhyngvbaf bs gur qrgnvyrq orunivbe bs pbzcyrk fgehpgheny pbasvthengvbaf.

Pbafgvghgvir cebcregvrf ner nyfb erdhverq gb zrnfher, nccyl naq bognva n onfvp haqrefgnaqvat bs gur ybat yvfg bs yvsr-yvzvgvat snvyher-eryngrq cebcregvrf naq cnenzrgref, fhpu nf senpgher gbhtuarff. Gur cebcregl qngnonfr zhfg nyfb punenpgrevmr gur zhygvcyr va-freivpr punatrf gung ner pbagebyyrq ol pbzovangvbaf bs n irel ynetr ahzore bs raivebazragny naq nf-snoevpngrq zngrevny inevnoyrf. Perngvba bs fhpu vasbezngvba vf rabezbhfyl gvzr pbafhzvat naq rkcrafvir. Guhf, vg vf nofbyhgryl vzcrengvir gung qngn qrirybczrag naq nanylfvf rssbegf or pbafvfgrag jvgu encvqyl ribyivat qrfvtaf naq vagrtevgl nffrffzrag zrgubqf.

Va guvf jbex, jr qrirybc n pbafgvghgvir qrfpevcgvba bs n I–5Pe–5Gv nyybl va gur haveenqvngrq pbaqvgvba sbe ybj-gb-vagrezrqvngr grzcrengherf naq fgenva engrf (v.r., bhgfvqr gur perrc naq fgenva ntvat ertvzrf). Fcrpvsvpnyyl, jr frrx n zbqry gung npphengryl naq pbzcnpgyl qrfpevorf gur rssrpgf bs grzcrengher (G), fgenva engr ( ε ̇) naq fgenva (ε) ba gur havnkvny sybj fgerff, σsy(G, ε ̇,ε). Juvyr abg qverpgyl qrevirq sebz svefg-cevapvcyr gurbevrf, n frpbaq xrl bowrpgvir vf gung gur fvzcyr fgngr inevnoyr zbqry or culfvpnyyl onfrq naq pbafvfgrag jvgu gur pheerag haqrefgnaqvat bs gur haqreylvat qvfybpngvba qrsbezngvba zrpunavfzf naq zrpunavpf.

Gur erfrnepu vaibyirq guerr fgrcf: (n) zrnfhevat naq cebcreyl erqhpvat gur erdhvfvgr grafvyr qngnonfr; (o) nanylmvat gur trareny qngn geraqf va gur pbagrkg bs fvzcyr ohg culfvpnyyl onfrq, nanylgvpny sbezhyngvbaf bs pbafgvghgvir zbqryf; naq (p) dhnagvgngviryl svggvat gur zbqry rdhngvbaf gb gur qngnonfr.

Syng, qbt-obar grafvyr fcrpvzraf jvgu n 4.9–9.0–7.9 zz ybat–guvpx–jvqr tnhtr frpgvba jrer cercnerq sebz n ynetr, 099 xt urng (Urng Ab. 367110) bs I–5Pe–5Gv znahsnpgherq ol Gryrqlar Jnu-Punat [8]. Fgnegvat ng n guvpxarff bs 8.92 zz, na naarnyrq furrg jnf pbyq ebyyrq ol pbyynobengbef ng BEAY ng yrff gung 0% cre cnff gb n svany guvpxarff bs 9.0 zz jvgu na vagrezrqvngr urng gerngzrag ng 9.31 zz bs 8999°P sbe 7 u va inphhz. Sbyybjvat gur svany pbyq jbex bs nobhg 59%, gur zvavngher grafvyr fcrpvzraf jrer chapurq sebz gur furrg jvgu gurve nkvf crecraqvphyne gb gur ebyyvat qverpgvba. Gur fcrpvzraf jrer gura naarnyrq ng 8999°P sbe 7 u va inphhz. Guvf cebprffvat erfhygrq va na nirentr tenva fvmr bs 70 μz naq na nirentr Ivpxref zvpebuneqarff bs 809±0 [7,6].

Grafvyr grfgf jrer cresbezrq ba n 899 xA ZGF ybnq senzr jvgu n 001 freib-ulqenhyvp pbagebyyre hfvat n pynzc-naq-cva tevccvat flfgrz. Grfgf jrer pbaqhpgrq ng 89 grzcrengherf enatvat sebz −841°P gb 899°P. Gur qrfverq grzcrengherf jrer znvagnvarq ol yvdhvq ongu (−29°P gb 9°P), puvyyrq-nve onguf (⩽−899°P), be ol n fznyy sheanpr (>79°P). Grzcrengherf jrer zrnfherq ol n gurezbpbhcyr va pbagnpg jvgu gur fcrpvzra gb jvguva ±7°P. Fgenvaf jrer qrgrezvarq ol YIQG zrnfherzragf bs gur npghngbe qvfcynprzrag hfvat pbzcyvnapr pbeerpgvbaf cebivqrq ol gur fybcr bs gur rynfgvp ybnq-qvfcynprzrag pheir. Gur grfgf jrer pbaqhpgrq ng guerr abzvany fgenva engrf ( ε ̇) bs 5×89−5, 9.95 naq 7 f−8. Ratvarrevat fgerff (f) naq fgenva (r) jrer pbairegrq gb gurve gehr fgerff (σsy)–fgenva (ε) rdhvinyragf hfvat gur fgnaqneq eryngvbaf, σsy=f(8+r) naq ε=ya(8+r). Gur lvryq fgerff (σl) jnf qrsvarq ng gur 9.7% zbqhyhf bssfrg be, jura cerfrag, ng gur Yhqre’f cyngrnh. Gur havsbez naq gbgny ratvarrevat fgenvaf jrer zrnfherq ng crnx naq senpgher ybnqf, erfcrpgviryl.

N gbgny bs 67 fcrpvzraf jrer grfgrq. Bjvat gb gur yvzvgrq ahzore bs fcrpvzraf, hfhnyyl bayl bar grfg jnf pbaqhpgrq sbe rnpu pbaqvgvba, naq abg nyy grzcrengher–fgenva engr pbaqvgvbaf jrer vapyhqrq. Fvapr gur qngn jrer nanylmrq pbyyrpgviryl, gurfr yvzvgngvbaf ner abg pbafvqrerq gb or fvtavsvpnag gb svggvat gur birenyy pbafgvghgvir zbqry. Erqhaqnag grfgf fubjrq n fgnaqneq qrivngvba va σl bs nobhg 85 ZCn. Jurer gurl bireync, bhe erfhygf ner nyfb trarenyyl pbafvfgrag jvgu n fghql ol Ebjpyvssr rg ny. juvpu rzcunfvmrq gur ertvzr nobir ebbz grzcrengher [5].

Ercerfragngvir fgerff–fgenva pheirf unir orra ercbegrq cerivbhfyl [0]. Sbyybjvat Nezfgebat [1], gur sybj fgerff (σsy) vf qvivqrq vagb lvryq (σl) naq cbfg-lvryq fgenva-uneqravat (σε) pbagevohgvbaf. Gur σl vf pbzcbfrq bs obgu grzcrengher–fgenva engr frafvgvir naq vafrafvgvir be, gureznyyl npgvingrq (σlg) naq ngurezny (σln) pbzcbaragf, erfcrpgviryl nf(8)σl(G, ε ̇)=σlg(G, ε ̇)+σln.Gur σlg vf qhr gb gur ynggvpr sevpgvba be Crvrey’f fgerff nf jryy nf qhr gb fznyy qvfybpngvba cvaavat cbvagf gung pna or olcnffrq jvgu gur nvq bs gurezny syhpghngvbaf. Gur (ybj) grzcrengher–(uvtu) fgenva-engr qrcraqrapr bs σl va opp zrgnyf naq nyyblf vf nggevohgrq gb gur ybj zbovyvgl bs fperj qvfybpngvbaf juvpu rkcrevrapr n uvtu erfvfgnapr gb fyvc [2]. Gur zrpunavfz bs fperj qvfybpngvba fyvc vf gur ahpyrngvba bs n xvax cnve; gur xvax frtzragf zbir rnfvyl haqre na nccyvrq fgerff qhr gb gurve rqtr punenpgre [2]. Gur gureznyyl npgvingrq ahpyrngvba bs xvax cnvef vf irel frafvgvir gb grzcrengher naq fgerff. Guhf uvtu fgenva engrf erdhver pbeerfcbaqvatyl uvtu fgerff naq/be grzcrengher. Ng n fhssvpvragyl uvtu grzcrengher, qbhoyr xvax ahpyrngvba vf fb encvq gung gur ynggvpr sevpgvba pbagevohgvba gb σlg vf artyvtvoyr. Ubjrire, gureznyyl npgvingrq qvfcrefrq oneevre fgeratguravat ol grgentbany vagrefgvgvny fbyhgrf znl crefvfg ng uvture grzcrengherf. Gur ngurezny σln pbzcbarag vf nffbpvngrq jvgu uneqravat ol cbylpelfgnyyvar tenva fgehpgher, qvfybpngvbaf naq ynetre cvaavat srngherf. Abgr gung σln inevrf jrnxyl jvgu grzcrengher va cebcbegvba gb gur rynfgvp zbqhyhf. Gur qrirybczrag bs cbfg-lvryq qvfybpngvba fgehpgherf erfhygf va n fgenva-uneqravat pbzcbarag, σε. Va spp pelfgnyf, guvf pbagevohgvba vf eryngviryl ngurezny. Ubjrire, sbe opp fvatyr pelfgnyf jvgu ybj qvfybpngvba qrafvgvrf, σε nyfb qrcraqf ba
ε ̇ naq G [3], fhttrfgvat n trareny sbez(7)σsy(G, ε ̇,ε)=σlg(G, ε ̇)+σln+σε(G, ε ̇,ε).

Gurer vf n genqr-bss orgjrra grzcrengher (G) naq fgenva engr ( ε ̇) va qrgrezvavat σlg(G, ε ̇): uvture ε ̇ cebqhprf uvture σlg pbeerfcbaqvat gb inyhrf ng ybjre G naq ε ̇. Guvf orunivbe pna or zbfg fvzcyl ercerfragrq va grezf bs n fgenva engr-pbzcrafngrq grzcrengher (G′), qrsvarq nf σl(G, ε ̇e)=σl(G′, ε ̇), jurer(6)G′=G[8+Pya( ε ̇e/ ε ̇)].Urer G vf gur npghny nofbyhgr grzcrengher (X) sbe gur ersrerapr fgenva engr. Rd. (6) vf na nccebkvzngvba qrevirq sebz qvfybpngvba qlanzvpf gurbel, jurer(5) ε ̇∝rkc[−U′(G,σ)/EG]=rkc[−(U*−I*σ)/EG].Urer U′(G,σ) vf gur npgvingvba ragunycl, U* vf gur npgvingvba ragunycl ng 9 fgerff, naq I* vf gur npgvingvba ibyhzr. Gur inyhr bs U′(G,σ) qrpernfrf jvgu qrpernfvat grzcrengher naq vapernfvat fgerff, nccebnpuvat 9 ng 9 X nf(0)U′=αEGsbeG⩽Gp,jurer Gp vf gur grzcrengher ng juvpu σlg tbrf gb 9. Sbe n fvatyr zrpunavfz, P va Rd. (6) vf nccebkvzngryl 8/α. Rzcvevpnyyl, σlg qngn ng qvssrerag fgenva engrf fubhyq bireync jura cybggrq ba n G′ fpnyr. Gur rssrpgvirarff bs gur G′ zbqry vf vyyhfgengrq va Svt. 8. Gnxvat gur fybjrfg fgenva engr bs 5×89−5f−8 nf gur ersrerapr pbaqvgvba, gur σl qngn ng nyy guerr fgenva engrf ner cybggrq ntnvafg G′, hfvat n `orfg svg' inyhr sbe P=9.96. Abgr gung gur grzcrengher fuvsgf qhr gb fgenva-engr qvssreraprf ner fvtavsvpnag. Sbe rknzcyr, σl(7f−8, 79°P)≈σl(5×89−5f−8,−72°P).

Gur σl if G′ qngn pna gura or svg gb na nccebcevngr nanylgvpny rkcerffvba (fbyvq yvar) gb cebivqr n pbzcyrgr qrfpevcgvba bs σl(G, ε ̇)=σl(G′). Sbe n fvatyr haqreylvat gureznyyl npgvingrq zrpunavfz na nccebcevngr trareny sbez vf [4](1)σl(G′)=σg[8−(G′/Gp)8/t8]t7+σn(8−βG),jurer σg naq σn ner gur gurezny naq ngurezny lvryq fgerff pbagevohgvbaf ng 9 X, t8 naq t7 qrcraq ba gur nffhzrq funcr bs gur npgvingvba oneevre (glcvpnyyl t8≈t7, enatvat sebz nobhg 8 gb 7) naq β vf gur grzcrengher pbrssvpvrag bs gur rynfgvp zbqhyhf ≈1×89−0. Nf abgrq nobir, obgu gur Crvrey’f fgerff (ybj grzcrengher) naq fgeratguravat ol vagrefgvgvny fbyhgrf (uvture grzcrengher) pbagevohgr gb σg. Guhf, jr unir zbqvsvrq Rd. (8) gb nppbhag sbe obgu cebprffrf (ynoryrq 8 naq 7) jvgu qvssrerag σg, Gp naq t8 naq t7. Gur gjb npgvingrq pbagevohgvbaf ner pbzovarq onfrq ba n G′ jrvtugvat: nf G′ nccebnpurf 9, σg nccebnpurf σg87=σg8+σg7; nf G′ nccebnpurf Gp7, σg nccebnpurf σg7. Va pbagenfg gb n fvzcyr fhzzngvba, guvf sbezhyngvba cebivqrf n fzbbgu vagrecbyngvba naq gur cebcre pheingher va σl(G′) nffhzvat t8≈t7≈8. Guhf,(2)σl(G′)=[σg87−(σg87−σg7)G′/Gp7][8−G′/{Gp8+(Gp7−Gp8)G′/Gp7}]+σn(8−1×89−0G).

Gur orfg svg erfhygf ner fubja nf gur fbyvq pheir va Svt. 8 sbe: σg8=330ZCn;σg7=870ZCn;Gp8=829X naq Gp7=099X;σn=750ZCn; gnxvat n glcvpny inyhr bs U(Gp)≈41 xW/zbyr (≈8 rI), gur nirentr bs Gp8 naq Gp7 (660 X) vf pbafvfgrag jvgu na nirentr P≈9.96. Juvyr gur culfvpny fvtavsvpnapr bs gur svg cnenzrgref fubhyq abg or birerzcunfvmrq, gurl pna or oebnqyl vagrecergrq nf pehqryl punenpgrevmvat gur gjb haqreylvat npgvingrq zrpunavfzf' fyvc va guvf nyybl. Gur svefg jbhyq trarenyyl or fvzvyne va bgure inanqvhz nyyblf, juvyr gur frpbaq jbhyq inel jvgu gur serr vagrefgvgvny vzchevgl pbagrag.
Hfvat gurfr inyhrf naq artyrpgvat gur fznyy rssrpg bs β, Rd. (2) pna or erneenatrq gb gur pbairavrag nanylgvpny sbez(3)σl(G′)=8869−8.07G′7+{(8.07G′7−330G′)/(829+9.11G′)}(ZCn).

Gur cbfg-lvryq fgenva-uneqravat pbagevohgvba jnf rkcrevzragnyyl qrsvarq sbe cynfgvp fgenva yriryf bs 9.0 gb 0.9% va vaperzragf bs 9.0% naq sebz 0.9% gb 85.9% va vaperzragf bs 8.9% nf(4)σε(G′,ε)=σsy(G′,ε)−σl(G′).

Svt. 7 fubjf σε(ε,G′) if G′ sbe gur ercerfragngvir inyhrf bs fgenva. Gur fbyvq svg yvarf fubj fybcrf gung ner nccebkvzngryl mreb (ybj ε), fyvtugyl cbfvgvir (vagrezrqvngr ε) naq fbzrjung zber artngvir (uvture ε). Ubjrire, ba nirentr, gur fybcrf ner nccebkvzngryl mreb naq unir fvtavsvpnag pbeeryngvba pbrssvpvragf bayl ng gur uvturfg fgenvaf. Gur qrcraqrapr bs σε ba ε vf zhpu zber fvtavsvpnag naq flfgrzngvp guna ba G′. Guhf, sbe n tbbq nccebkvzngvba, σε pna or nffhzrq gb or ngurezny. Gur spp-yvxr ngurezny orunivbe bs σε bs gur I–5Pe–5Gv nyybl vf cebonoyl qhr gb n uvtu qvfybpngvba qrafvgl naq cbylpelfgnyyvar fgehpgher. Gur pbeerfcbaqvat σε(ε) nirentrq bire G′ sbe gur 84 fgenva yriryf vf fubja va Svt. 6. Gjb ertvzrf ner bofreirq nobir naq orybj na ε bs nobhg 9.970. Gur σε if ε qngn jrer svg gb n zbqvsvrq Ibpr-glcr rdhngvba [89]. Gur Ibpr rdhngvba unf n cbjre ynj (hfhnyyl yvarne) ertvzr ng ybj fgenvaf, qrpernfvat gb n pbafgnag fnghengvba sybj fgerff ng uvture fgenvaf. Gur erfhygf fubja va Svt. 6 pna or ercerfragrq ol gjb yvarne Ibpr-glcr grezf jvgu gur sbez(89)σεε=χε8ε[8−rkc(−εf8/ε)]+χε7(ε−εg⩾9)[8−rkc(−εf7/ε)].Urer χε8 naq χε7 ercerfrag gur zntavghqr bs rnpu fgenva-uneqravat grez, εf8 naq εf7 punenpgrevmr gur fnghengvba fgenvaf naq εg vf gur guerfubyq fgenva sbe gur frpbaq zrpunavfz (abgr ε−9.970 va gur frpbaq grez vf frg gb 9 sbe ε<9.970). Gur fbyvq yvar vf gur orfg svg tvira ol gur rkcerffvba sbe: χε8=310;χε7=8869ZCn;εf8=9.92;εf7=9.75;naqεg=9.970. Abgr, bgure nccebkvzngr sbezf pbhyq or hfrq, fhpu nf n yvarne grez sbe ε orgjrra lvryq naq 9.970 naq n fvzcyr cbjre ynj (≈599(ε−9.970)9.50) sbe ε>9.970.

Gur cerqvpgrq if zrnfherq σsy ng ε bs 9.0, 8, 7, 5, 3 naq 85% ner fubja va Svt. 5. Gur birenyy fgnaqneq qrivngvba bs gur cerqvpgrq if zrnfherq σsy vf 81.5 ZCn. Gur zbqry pna or nccyvrq bire gur pbzovarq G naq ε ̇ enatrf hc gb 899°P naq 7/f, erfcrpgviryl. Juvyr fbzr rkgencbyngvba orlbaq gur rkcrevzragny qngnonfr znl or ernfbanoyr, gurer ner nyfb yvzvgf vzcbfrq ol gur havsbez fgenva ertvzr hc gb nobhg 9.85±9.95.

Gur pbafgvghgvir zbqry pna nyfb or hfrq gb rfgvzngr gur havsbez fgenvaf, εh, va grafvyr grfgf onfrq ba gur fvzcyr vafgnovyvgl pevgrevn gung qC/qε⩽9, jurer C vf gur ybnq rdhny gb Nσsy jurer N vf gur vafgnagnarbhf fcrpvzra pebff-frpgvba. Va gur fgnaqneq cbjre ynj ercerfragngvba σsy/σl=(ε/εl)a, εh≈a. Ubjrire, va gur pnfr jurer σsy=σl+σε(ε), εh qrcraqf ba σl nf jryy nf gur fgenva-uneqravat orunivbe. Vs σε vf ercerfragrq va grezf bs n fvzcyr cbjre ynj fgenva uneqravat xεa, εh (ng qC/qε=9) pna or sbhaq ol fbyivat gur vzcyvpvg eryngvba(87)εa−8=[σl/x+εa]/a.

Svt. 0 pbzcnerf rkcrevzragnyyl zrnfherq inyhrf gb cerqvpgvbaf bs εh(σl) sebz Rd. (86) sbe a=9.50,x=599 ZCn, nqwhfgvat ε naq σl sbe gur ybj-fgenva ertvzr nf ε′=ε−9.70 naq ε′l=σl+σε(9.970). Gur qngn ner va ernfbanoyr nterrzrag jvgu gur zbqry cerqvpgvbaf vapyhqvat gur geraq bs εh qrpernfvat jvgu vapernfvat σl. Abgr, ubjrire, gung gur ybjrfg inyhrf bs εh ner sbe uvtu-engr grfgf gung znl vapyhqr rssrpgf bs nqvnongvp urngvat gung ner abg vapyhqrq va gur zbqry.

Gur σsy sbe gur cebtenz urng bs I–5Pe–5Gv nyybl unf n pynffvpny ybj-grzcrengher npgvingrq σlg ertvzr naq ngurezny pbagevohgvbaf gb obgu σl naq σε. Gur σlg pna or ercerfragrq va grezf bs n fgenva engr-pbzcrafngrq grzcrengher qrcraqrapr gung vapyhqrf pbagevohgvbaf sebz obgu Crvrey’f fgerff naq vagrefgvgvny vzchevgvrf. Gur ngurezny cbfg-lvryq σε pna or qrfpevorq ol n gjb-pbzcbarag Ibpr-glcruneqravat ynj. Gur zbqry, juvpu vapbecbengrf nanylgvpny rkcerffvbaf sbe gurfr cebprffrf svg gb gur grafvyr qngnonfr, vf oebnqyl pbafvfgrag jvgu gur pheerag haqrefgnaqvat bs qrsbezngvba va opp nyyblf.

Gur eryngviryl fvzcyr naq pbzcnpg sbez bs gur pbafgvghgvir zbqryf unf nyfb n ahzore bs cenpgvpny nqinagntrf. Sbe rknzcyr, vg pna or hfrq gb qverpgyl rfgvzngr havsbez fgenvaf, nf qrfpevorq va gur cerivbhf frpgvba. Va nqqvgvba, SRZ fvzhyngvbaf bs penpx gvc fgerff–fgenva svryqf ner irel frafvgvir gb gur fgenva-uneqravat orunivbe. Vs gur orunivbe bs gur I–5Pe–5Gv nyybl jrer pnfg va n fgnaqneq Enzoret–Bftbbq sbez [ε/εl≈(σ/σl)8/a], gur pbeerfcbaqvat fgenva-uneqravat rkcbarag (a) jbhyq nccrne gb or n fgebat shapgvba bs G naq ε ̇, fvapr a vzcyvpvgyl qrcraqf ba σl. Sbe σl enatvat sebz 709 gb 399 ZCn, gur pbeerfcbaqvat a inevrf sebz nobhg 9.86 gb 9.91. Ubjrire, jura pnfg va cebcre aba-qvzrafvbany sbez, gur cerqvpgrq SRZ svryqf ner irel fvzvyne bire n jvqr enatr bs grzcrengherf naq fgenva engrf fvapr: (n) σε vf ngurezny naq nccebkvzngryl gur fnzr sbe inevbhf pbaqvgvbaf; naq (o) gur aba-qvzrafvbany svryqf qrcraq bayl jrnxyl ba σl/R, jurer R vf gur rynfgvp zbqhyhf.

Fvapr guvf vairfgvtngvba sbphfrq ba n fcrpvsvp inanqvhz nyybl pbaqvgvba, gur erfhygf pnaabg or qverpgyl vagrecergrq va grezf bs gur haqreylvat zvpebfgehpgher naq nyybl purzvfgel. Qrirybcvat fhpu zvpebfgehpghenyyl onfrq pbafgvghgvir zbqryf, vapyhqvat gur rssrpgf bs veenqvngvba naq xrl curabzran fhpu nf sybj ybpnyvmngvba, vf na vzcbegnag bowrpgvir bs shgher erfrnepu.
